divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home in dudley, i was on a small hill looking out towards Clenthills. 30 degrees left of the hills i saw a bright yellow coloured orb with aslightly red orange center just over a mile or two away. It faded slightly twiceand dissapeared whilst holding its position in the sky.
